PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-06042019-05-31HC,  ,  ,  , 
ActControlled Drugs and Substances Act
Cannabis Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Narcotic Control Regulations (Licences and Permits)
PrecisRegulations Amending the NARCOTIC CONTROL REGULATIONS (LICENCES AND PERMITS) in order to (1) modernize and improve the administration of, and compliance with, the Narcotic Control Regulations, Benzodiazepines and Other Targeted Substances Regulations, Part G and Part J of the Food and Drug Regulations by removing certain requirements that impose undue administrative burden, and including consistent authorities and requirements across these regulations; and, (2) further enhance the clarity and readability of these regulations by modernizing and harmonizing the regulatory provisions in relation to licences and permits, with the application of up-to-date legislative drafting convention.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0169 Publication Date: 2019-06-12
AttachmentsAttachment
